name: 柯萊恩
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。

SYLLABUS

In this course we will introduce and develop skills and techniques necessary for a basic understanding of English reading, listening and speaking.  The emphasis will be upon developing writing skills, oral fluidity, comprehension, retention, vocabulary, syntax and an increasing sophistication in thinking in English.


STUDENT RESPONSIBILITIES

1) Presentations.  Students will give at least one oral presentation in concert with two or three classmates.  Preparation for this presentation will help you gain greater value in the class.

2)  Attendance.  Frequent attendance is mandatory.  After your first two absences, each subsequent unexcused absence will cause your final grade to be reduced by five grade points.  If you are absent, it is your responsibility to find out the substance of class discussions and to make up homework.  

5)  Anyone caught plagiarizing will receive a failing grade in the course.  All outside sources that you use in the production of your papers must be properly attributed using the MLA format.

GRADING

50%　　Coursework (+ extra credit for English Corner, TED, etc.)
20%　　Presentation(s)
15%　　Midterm
15% 　　Final
